reference_no_or_id: Criminal Jail Appeal No,7 and Murder Reference No,1 of 2013
case_number: Criminal Jail Appeal No. 7 and Murder Reference No. 1 of 2013

victims.name: Rehmdil
victims.injury: Bullet shot at right side of chest

incident_details.location: Quarter of Ustad Mehmood, Lal Jan Colony, Turbat
incident_details.description: Niaz Ahmed fired at Rehmdil and Murad Ali without any reason.

fir_details.lodging_time: Within half an hour of the incident

complaint_summary: On July 16, 2012, Faqir lodged a report alleging that Niaz Ahmed fired at Rehmdil and Murad Ali, causing fatal injuries without provocation.
investigation_summary: The police registered an FIR, conducted investigations, and recovered empties and a TT pistol from the crime scene. Niaz Ahmed was arrested on-site.
judgment_summary: The court upheld the conviction and death sentence for Niaz Ahmed under Section 302(b) PPC for double murder. Compensation of Rs. 200,000 was ordered for each victim's heirs, with six months of additional imprisonment for default.
punishment: Death sentence on two counts, Rs. 200,000 compensation for each victim's heirs, six months additional imprisonment for default.

charges.section_302b_ppc: Death sentence on two counts for Qatl-e-Amd
charges.section_540a_crpc: Compensation of Rs. 200,000 to legal heirs of each deceased, with six months S.I. in default

key_points: Delay in sending empties for analysis
Doubtful arrest and recovery of pistol
Incident occurred in daylight with clear identification
Prosecution evidence corroborated by witnesses and medical reports
No motive for complainant to implicate an innocent person

key_findings.eye_witness: Abdul Rauf's testimony corroborated by other witnesses and medical evidence
key_findings.recovery: Empties and TT pistol recovered at the scene
key_findings.motive: Absence of motive does not mitigate sentence
key_findings.culprit_identity: Incident occurred in daylight with clear identification of Niaz Ahmed

sentence.death_penalty: Confirmed for two counts of murder
sentence.compensation: Rs. 200,000 to legal heirs of each deceased
sentence.default_penalty: Six months S.I. for non-payment of compensation

witness_statement.Faqir: Reported the incident and identified the accused.
witness_statement.Abdul Ghani: Supported recovery of empties and pistol.

key_issues: Delay in sending empties for analysis

maxims.falsus in uno falsus in omnibus: Discarded by courts; reliable parts of testimony accepted.

summary_vector_notes: The case involves the double murder of Rehmdil and Murad Ali by Niaz Ahmed. The court upheld the death sentence based on corroborative evidence, rejecting defense arguments of contradictions and delays in evidence processing. Compensation was ordered for the victims' heirs.
